nodes.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)
nodes.short_description: Fabricates Apple Watch S-series chips; critical for performance and efficiency.

nodes.title: Luxshare Precision
nodes.short_description: Major assembler of Apple Watch; key to production capacity and cost.

nodes.title: LG Display
nodes.short_description: Supplies OLED displays for Apple Watch; impacts screen quality and availability.

nodes.title: Samsung Display
nodes.short_description: Alternate OLED supplier for Apple Watch; mitigates display supply risk.

nodes.title: Masimo Corporation
nodes.short_description: Medical device firm suing over pulse oximetry; triggered U.S. import restrictions.

nodes.title: U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
nodes.short_description: Regulator granting clearances for ECG and heart rhythm features.

nodes.title: U.S. International Trade Commission (ITC)
nodes.short_description: Agency that ordered import bans affecting certain Apple Watch models.

nodes.title: China
nodes.short_description: Primary manufacturing base for components and assembly.

nodes.title: Vietnam
nodes.short_description: Alternative assembly hub for Apple Watch diversification.

nodes.title: United States
nodes.short_description: Largest market and regulatory jurisdiction for Apple Watch.

nodes.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch
nodes.short_description: Direct competitor shaping smartwatch features, pricing, and ecosystem expectations.

nodes.title: Joe Kiani
nodes.short_description: Masimo CEO leading patent actions impacting Apple Watch sales.

nodes.title: Smartwatch industry
nodes.short_description: Market dynamics drive product roadmap and competition.
